about_the_game:
Welcome to a world that brings to life the brothels of the future.
Here, you'll experience a realistic, intimate encounter with a beautiful girl in VR that is so shockingly immersive that you'll swear you were actually right there. As well as titillating VR experiences that are sure to get your pulse racing.
You'll be free to do whatever you wish, and to revisit as many times as you like. So why not dive in, and experience pleasures that are at once real and far beyond the limits of reality.

Controls:
The player is able to move freely, and to change the situation by touching the cube.
Touching the ball allows the player to switch between dickgir(Futanari) and female versions.
The player can view their gorgeous beauty from a range of different angles.

Features:
- Physics engine recreates situations in vivid detail.
- Supports 6DoF, allowing for unlimited freedom and greater immersion.
- The room will be automatically cleaned if it's dirty.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content or themes that are appropriate only for adult.

Themes in this game include:
> Explicit consensual sex scenes.
> Nakedness
> genitals
> lewd situations

All persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

name: Hentai VR 18+

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
